QuestData.Title: Amulet of Rukhmar: The Apexis Device
QuestData.Description:
Now that the keys have been activated, the Apexis device that leads to the amulet should be accessible.
The Arakkoa research states that it is likely located in Lost Veil Anzu, within the "shrine to the raven god."
QuestData.LogDescription: Activate the Apexis device and claim the Amulet of Rukhmar.
